price: Na bila ya shaka neno letu lilikwisha tangulia kwa waja wetu walio tumwa.
footnotes: Ninaapa! Hukumu yetu kwa Mitume tulio watuma imekwisha tolewa mbele, ya kwamba ushindi na matokeo mema ni yao wao dhidi ya makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
